Hi All,

These are from my first session with my n=
ew P SB-7.

I  conducted this experiment with my 6 year old daughter. Unfor=

to be  influenced by her. I will admit though that she seems =

things  much better then I can.

Though I am still not convi=
nced, some of these  are uncanny, and I was 
surprised. I will be conductin=
g ongoing, regular  experiments with this.

Opinions are  welcome.

Thanks!=

April
